name: Lumen Lumos Library
description:
A text adventure where you awaken alone in a prison. The last thing you remember is having failed a previous job. You're only left with a cryptic note and an even  more mysterious book of riddles. Will you be able to solve them? Will you figure out what the riddles are for? Where does all of this lead?

Main Commands you'll be using are: Examine (x), Take, Open, Consume, Attack (atk), and Stats. 

Some known bugs:

Targets are duplicated.

Current Health does go above the maximum.

Game doesn't always end properly when losing a fight.

Do tell me if the Linux version works properly or at all.
